examples.example: 每天出门前，我都会对着镜子给自己一个微笑，开启美好的一天。

translate.english: Every day before going out, I will give myself a smile in the mirror to start a beautiful day.

examples.example: 阳光明媚的日子里，我开心地出门去感受大自然的美好。

translate.english: On a sunny day, I happily go out to feel the beauty of nature.

examples.example: 每次出门旅行，我都能收获满满的快乐和难忘的回忆。

translate.english: Every time I go out for a trip, I can gain a lot of happiness and unforgettable memories.
